name: Amazy Move Token
description: AMAZY is a lifestyle app with gaming features. Take your first step into the Web 3.0 world to stay fit, learn something new and receive in-game tokens at the same time. AMAZY is a motivational app with gaming features. You wear trendy 3D sneakers, go for a walk or a jog, and receive in-game tokens. Each pair of sneakers comes with a unique 3D design and a certain level of rarity. Upgrade your shoes, level up, and share your workout results with friends. Our mission is to build a community of happy, healthy and proactive members making a difference in the world. AMAZY may become your first confident step into the Web 3.0 world. AMT the appâ€™s internal move & earn token, has an unlimited supply and is earned when the user performs an activity in the app and consumes energy. AMT is burned when the user consumes AMT in the app or performs a sneaker mint.
